about.details:
Incorporated in 1999, Keerti Knowledge and Skills Ltd works as an information technology training company in India. They are one of the largest IT training institutes in Mumbai & Thane region that trains youth and students in multiple segments of Information Technology.

They provide tutoring of basic computer knowledge, Internet, surfing, and computer courses including Microsoft office, accounting and financial management, inventory management, statutory capabilities, and tally.net capabilities; accounting courses, such as tally; and various computer languages comprising C++,.Net, Java and Oracle, communication and soft skills, etc.

Keerti Knowledge has expanded business through its two subsidiary Companies i.e. Keerti Institute India Private Ltd and Keerti Tutorials India Private Ltd and KKSL has vide Business Transfer Agreement dated 2nd April, 2015 transferred its business of IT education sector which is on franchise basis to the Keerti Institute India Private Limited (KIIPL) for advancement and to rationalize the future growth of franchise business in IT education sector in future along with authorization of Maharashtra Knowledge Corporate Limited (MKCL)to conduct MKCL’s Courses. Thereafter, KIIPL entered into 90 afresh franchisees Agreements at various locations in Mumbai and Thane. The core activity of KKSL includes Training and Placement, State and Central Government programs and High End Technical programs.

contactDetails.full_address: Keerti Knowledge And Skills Ltd, 65/2823 Ashadeep CHS Ltd, Gandhi Nagar Near MIG Cricket Club, Bandra (East)

faqs.question: What is the Keerti Knowledge IPO?
faqs.answer:
Keerti Knowledge IPO is a SME IPO of 780000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.06 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹52 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on July 24, 2017, and closes on July 28, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Keerti Knowledge IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Keerti Knowledge IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Keerti Knowledge IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Keerti Knowledge IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Keerti Knowledge IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Keerti Knowledge IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Keerti Knowledge IPO opens on July 24, 2017 and closes on July 28, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Keerti Knowledge IPO?
faqs.answer: Keerti Knowledge IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Keerti Knowledge IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Keerti Knowledge IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
